bibl.title: The Fourth-Century Churches at Ismant el-Kharab.

bibl.seg: BOWEN Gillian E., The Fourth-Century Churches at Ismant el-Kharab.

Colin A. HOPE and Gillian E. BOWEN (Edd.), Dakhleh Oasis Project: Preliminary Reports on the 1994-1995 to 1998-1999 Field Seasons = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 11 (Oxford - Oakville, Connecticut, 2002) pp. 65-85, 10 figg., 4 plans.
